chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 has a problem:

The frame has a large scratch on the left side of the screen profile, which is even noticeable when the screen is on and affects image interaction. This is not in line with the state I requested.

Thanks,


When the seller receives the package, they have 3 business days (5 business days for portable and household appliances) to repair or replace the product, or 2 business days to make a refund if necessary.

The customer must meet the following requirements for the return process:

✔ Confirms that the device has not been opened by a third party, exposed to water, or suffered an impact or fall
✔ Confirms that all personal data has been deleted
✔ Has confirmed that they have the return label.
✔ Understands that accessories and purchase proof must be included in the return package.
✔ Understands that they have 14 days to use the return label.

Remember: once delivered, the seller has 3 days (5 days for portable and household appliances) to repair or replace the item and 2 days to make a refund if necessary.

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
YL
